title: Honor System
body: I recently got out of my 10 game chat ban and been dropped down to Honor level 1. I then went positive every game after that, and got a few honors here and there. It has been around 2 weeks since my ban was gone, and 2 weeks of this positivity, but my honor level doesn't seem to level up. Does anyone know if you can actually progress to honor level 3, or get back to a honor level after you have been demoted? Or does it start fresh in Season 8?

replies.body:
With RIOT, the things are really simple. You can be 7 seasons maximum positive with honor level 5 and full honors and in a bad day of flaming you will get a permanent ban. SO SIMPLE. 
You can demote to honor level 1 in just one bad day and trying for whole months of positivity to get back to honor level 2. Good Luck man.
You can still rank back up in Honor even after getting a punishment like a chat penalty. It may take a bit, but I do see that you've been getting honor and gaining that honor experience.
